title: How to Catch Butterflies
description: For seven years, career girl Rebecca Keane had been stuck in an abusive relationship with David Rosenberg. Until one night, fate intervenes, enforcing the strong-minded Lucy Watters, her long lost best friend, back into her life.Will David Rosenberg let her go?Together, the two friends will embark on a journey of self discovery. Can they learn to trust or love again? Or will careers and life get in the way?Can Rebecca and Lucy learn how to spread their wings and fly? Or will they fall into one of the men’s nets and be caught forever?Join these two London girls on their international journey of love in the first part of a series of Butterflies books, because ‘A girl should be like a butterfly. Pretty to see, but hard to catch....'This book contains explicit sex scenes and is recommended for readers 18+
author: Samantha Fontien
